short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn the UofU photo ids into a flip card test

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application is only for UofU instructors who wish to train themselves on their student names.  Courtesy of a fellow faculty member with too large of classes.
